content:
The Department of Computer Science and Technology is seeking to recruit a new faculty member at the Assistant Professor/Associate Professor level who will contribute to research and teaching in algorithms and computational complexity.

While the focus of this appointment is algorithms and complexity, exceptional applicants from all areas of Computer Science will be considered.

In case you are considering this position, do not hesitate to reach out to me. Cambridge (and greater London) has a great Lean crowd, who would certainly welcome your Lean expertise.

https://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/52323/
